00032                 function index()
00033                 {
00034                         $conn = Db::get_connection();
00035 
00036                         if (isset($_GET['software_name']))
00037                         {
00038                                 $software_factory = new Software();
00039                                 $softwares = $software_factory->find_all(array('where_clause' => "`name` = '{$conn->escape($_GET['software_name'])}' AND (`name` != 'guidatv' OR `type` = 'macosx')",
00040                                         'limit' => 1));
00041                                 if (count($softwares) > 0)
00042                                 {
00043                                         $this->software = $softwares[0];
00044                                         $this->software->has_many('software_releases');
00045                                         // Sort releases
00046                                         $releases = $this->software->software_releases;
00047                                         usort($releases, array($releases[0], 'sort_releases'));
00048                                         $this->software->release = $releases[0];
00049                                         $this->software->release->has_many('software_artifacts');
00050 
00051                                         // Horrible hack to enable per-software caching.
00052                                         $_REQUEST['id'] = $this->software->id;
00053                                 }
00054                         }
00055                         else if (isset($_GET['id']))
00056                         {
00057                                 $this->software = new Software();
00058                                 $this->software->find_by_id($_GET['id']);
00059                                 $this->software->has_many('software_releases');
00060                                 // Sort releases
00061                                 $releases = $this->software->software_releases;
00062 
00063                                 usort($releases, array($releases[0], 'sort_releases'));
00064                                 $this->software->release = $releases[0];
00065                                 $this->software->release->has_many('software_artifacts');
00066                         }
00067                         else
00068                         {
00069                                 $this->render_error();
00070                         }
00071                         
00072                         Db::close_connection($conn);
00073                 }
